title: Try it, attempt to live it before its too late......

body:
>>>>generic attention grabber<<<<<

They always say try "it" while your young, do "it", expirence "it" all while you have the chance.......
Have a read any support  would be amazing ^_^

Have you ever sat there and gone, "Ugh when im 30 to 35 years old i really dont want to look back on my twenties and go oh wish i had of done that or tried to do "it" or worked harder on that..... then go oh well, got to work tomorrow,"? 
Well basically on my last days off i had that exact  thought, i felt like i was going no where and gonna achieve nothing but a stable job and a house with my partner. 

I suppose where im going with this is im announcing that this year and next year while im finishing my electrical  trade certificate that i will be training to go pro on the MOBA (massive online battle areana) 5v5 game, called league of legends. My plan is to get fit so my brain can be 100 hundred percent active for high speed reaction and decision making that the team based sport requires. To stream my progress/training 8 hours a day on my days off from work so i can gain some publcity in order to be noticed by OPL teams and to establish a basis to attempt full time streaming (professional entertainment basically). And to top it off By the end of 2017 be in the top 10 of challenger players (highest ranking on oceanic server). 

This is all to achieve my dream of being a professional League of Legends player: traveling for competition, experiencing new groups of people,  and competing in the world championships with thousands upon thousands of people  watching and cheering my team on or booing. Either all, it definitely would be the experience of a life time. So why not come watch my origin story as it forms? 

Ill be fighting for this goal till the end, no giving in! 
Hey guys any help is invaluable  to me so please SHARE this post and help me get kick started 

my stream/climb Facebook page  https://m.facebook.com/MangekyouEterno/

Or watch me on my days off.
www.Twitch.tv/Mangekyou_eterno

First stream will be on the 18th or 19 depending on how busy i am.  Also check out the FB page as i post  on there just before going live.
